祇園会: (ぎおんえ) - Gion Festival (in Kyoto during the month of July, with high point on the 17th)

祈り求める: (いのりもとめる) - to pray for

祈祷課題: (きとうかだい) - prayer request; request for prayers
祈禱師: (きとうし) - medicine man; shaman; faith healer; witch doctor; exorcist

祓う: (はらう) - to exorcise; to cleanse; to purify
祓串: (はらえぐし) - tamagushi used at Ise Shrine's purification ceremonies

祖先形質: (そせんけいしつ) - plesiomorphy; ancestral character
